name: Anti-Designator EMP Designator, Crewed, (aDEmpDC-11)
description: The electromagnetic pulse (EMP) anti-designator senses marking of an EMP designator and targets the designator. The anti-designator can automatically fire a weapon at the designator or await a user's command to do so.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
